name: Elva-memory
description: Memory NFT of Elva by Neura

attributes.value: Elva grew up by the sea, daydreaming about ocean adventures. A trip to Europe at 14, where she joined a real voyage, ignited her passion for sailing. Since then, she's studied navigation, drawn fantasy maps, and pursued seafaring with unshakable resolve. Her inner world is vivid, her spirit braveâ€”always chasing freedom and light beyond the horizon.
